ygData.msgSnippet: Shaman and druids charm animals, but none of that effects pvp. Necros fear.. That does effect pvp. That is there pest tactic. Fear and dot

Shaman and druids charm animals, but none of that effects pvp. Necros fear..
That does effect pvp. That is there pest tactic. Fear and dot
